divs: Sighting DetailsIt was witness by a frind between the Hollywood hills and Downtown los angeles ...Long cigarish and very black..In broad daylight the sun did misteriously not reflect off the object.It was massive like about 300 ft long...Then suddenly dissapeared....Witnessed by long time friend Manny Morales..
